REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sSQL1 AS String,sSQL2 AS String Dim vSQLArray AS Variant
Sub Formular_init() init_Form_Kontaktdaten() init_Form_Steuerung() init_Form_Ansprechpartner() init_List_Kontaktauswahl() init_Box_Anrede() init_Box_Titel() init_Column_Anrede() init_Column_Titel() End Sub
Sub init_Form_Kontaktdaten() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM "& sKontakte &" WHERE KontaktID=:c" oForm_Kontaktdaten.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Kontaktdaten.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Kontaktdaten.CommandType=2 oForm_Kontaktdaten.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Kontaktdaten.Cycle=1 oForm_Kontaktdaten.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Ansprechpartner() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM "& sAnsprechpartner_Kontakte &" WHERE KontaktID=:c" oForm_Ansprechpartner.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Ansprechpartner.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Ansprechpartner.CommandType=2 oForm_Ansprechpartner.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Ansprechpartner.Cycle=1 oForm_Ansprechpartner.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Steuerung() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM Steuerung WHERE ClientID="& iClientID oForm_Steuerung.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Steuerung.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Steuerung.CommandType=2 oForm_Steuerung.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Steuerung.Cycle=1 oForm_Steuerung.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_List_Kontaktauswahl() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT"&_ " CONCAT(t1.Name1,', ',t1.Vorname,' ',t1.Name2,' --> ',t1.Ort) AS Name,"&_ " t1.KontaktID"&_ " FROM "& sKontakte &" AS t1"&_ " INNER JOIN Steuerung AS t2"&_ " ON t2.ClientID="& iClientID &_ " WHERE ((((t1.Name1 LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Vorname LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Name2 LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Name3 LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Name4 LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Land LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.PLZ LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Ort LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Strasse LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Hausnummer LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Mindestangaben LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Telefon LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Funktelefon LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Fax LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.EMail LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Url LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Aquise LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.Bemerkungen LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%')"&_ " OR t1.ReferenzID LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.Suchstring,'%'))"&_ " AND t2.Suchstring IS NOT NULL))"&_ " OR (t1.Name1 LIKE '%' AND t2.Suchstring IS NULL))"&_ " ORDER BY t1.Name1 ASC") oList_Kontaktauswahl.ListSourceType=4 oList_Kontaktauswahl.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_Box_Anrede() vSQLArray="SELECT DISTINCT Anrede"&_ " FROM "& sKontakte &_ " ORDER BY Anrede ASC" oComboBox_Anrede.ListSourceType=4 oComboBox_Anrede.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_Box_Titel() vSQLArray="SELECT DISTINCT Titel"&_ " FROM "& sKontakte &_ " ORDER BY Titel ASC" oComboBox_Titel.ListSourceType=4 oComboBox_Titel.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_Column_Anrede() vSQLArray="SELECT DISTINCT Anrede"&_ " FROM "& sAnsprechpartner_Kontakte &_ " ORDER BY Anrede ASC" oColumn_Anrede.ListSourceType=4 oColumn_Anrede.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
Sub init_Column_Titel() vSQLArray="SELECT DISTINCT Titel"&_ " FROM "& sAnsprechpartner_Kontakte &_ " ORDER BY Titel ASC" oColumn_Titel.ListSourceType=4 oColumn_Titel.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
